## Zotero Citations

The task is to cite all work published in physical review B on the topic of iron phthalocyanine in the last 20 years. 

In order to do this quickly, we will use 2 tools, [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/) and [LaTeX on OverLeaf](https://www.overleaf.com/)
